hints.label: thm-j-nu-vanishes-qsd
hints.title: Energy-Momentum Conservation at QSD
hints.content:
99: :label: thm-j-nu-vanishes-qsd
100: 
101: At the quasi-stationary distribution, the energy-momentum source term vanishes:
102: 
103: $$
104: J^\nu[\mu_{\text{QSD}}] = 0
105: $$
106: 
107: to all orders in the system parameters.
108: 
109: **Consequence**: The modified Einstein equations $\nabla_\mu G^{\mu\nu} = \kappa J^\nu$ reduce to standard Einstein equations:
110: 
111: $$
112: G_{\mu\nu} = 8\pi G T_{\mu\nu}
113: $$

hints.label: thm-no-bulk-flow-qsd
hints.title: Vanishing Bulk Flow at QSD
hints.content:
211: :label: thm-no-bulk-flow-qsd
212: 
213: Under the conditions:
214: 1. All external forces are potential-derived: $F(x) = -\nabla U(x)$
215: 2. No external flow fields: $u_{\text{ext}}(x) = 0$ in the Langevin dynamics
216: 3. The system has reached the QSD: $\partial_t \mu_{\text{QSD}} = 0$
217: 
218: the mean velocity field vanishes everywhere:
219: 
220: $$
221: u(x) := \frac{1}{\rho(x)} \int v \, \mu_{\text{QSD}}(x, v) \, dv = 0 \quad \forall x
hints.raw_directive:
208: **Proof of vanishing bulk flow**: We now prove this rigorously from the structure of the QSD.
209: 
210: :::{prf:theorem} Vanishing Bulk Flow at QSD
211: :label: thm-no-bulk-flow-qsd
212: 
213: Under the conditions:
214: 1. All external forces are potential-derived: $F(x) = -\nabla U(x)$
215: 2. No external flow fields: $u_{\text{ext}}(x) = 0$ in the Langevin dynamics
216: 3. The system has reached the QSD: $\partial_t \mu_{\text{QSD}} = 0$
217: 
218: the mean velocity field vanishes everywhere:
219: 
220: $$
221: u(x) := \frac{1}{\rho(x)} \int v \, \mu_{\text{QSD}}(x, v) \, dv = 0 \quad \forall x
222: $$
